name: FiSimply
tag_list: custom-technology, consulting, digital-display, international-trade, supply-chain-logistics, swot, documentation, simple-solutions, simplify, ipc, arm, developer, integrator, led
overview:
FiSimply is a private consulting firm which delivers custom technology solutions and International trade resource for companies looking to simplify/streamline their operations.

Through a mix of direct consulting and strategic partnerships, FiSimply offers options to: -source custom technology solutions for servers, networks, digital display (interior or exterior) applications. -establish Cloud-based (or cloud-paging) systems for SaaS (software as a service) -receive training/advice on developing an interior/exterior sales division (either partnered or as a one-stop shop for clients) -simplify complex technology documentation, information, systems -analyze SWOT (strengths – weaknesses – opportunities – threats) to their business -establish DR (disaster recovery) and BCP (business continuity planning) in regard to the facility in total or with specifics focused on IT -create/review/strengthen international trade (export/import) for their product line/service offerings -establish supply chain logistics for international trade
